entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
